# Financial Crisis, 2008
***

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning= FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(plotly)

source('../Charts/Financ_Annual_Chart.R')
financial.annual.chart('income')
```

***

From this double axis chart of total visitors and national income pre capita, we can see there is a positive correlation between this two index around 2008. We can see the visits starts to increase again after 2009, but the **Great East Japan earthquake** in 2011 stop the upper tendency.
